mapper.select: SELECT member_id as memberId FROM mini_market_chatroom WHERE chatroom_no = #{chatroomNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE mini_market_chatroom SET chatroom_active = 'disconnect' WHERE member_item_no = #{memberItemNo}
mapper.select: SELECT nickname as nickName, member_unique_no as memberUniqueNo, member_item_no as memberItemNo FROM mini_market_chatroom WHERE member_item_no = #{memberItemNo}

SELECT chatroom_no as chatroomNo, member_unique_no as memberUniqueNo, nickname as nickName, member_id as memberId, member_item_no as memberItemNo FROM mini_market_chatroom WHERE chatroom_no = #{chatroomNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mini_market_chatroom WHERE member_item_no = #{memberItemNo} AND member_unique_no = #{memberUniqueNo}

SELECT c.chatroom_no AS chatroomNo, c.member_unique_no AS memberUniqueNo, c.nickname as nickName, c.chatroom_active AS chatroomActive, c.member_id AS memberId, i.member_item_title AS memberItemTitle, m.member_nickname AS memberNickname, i.member_item_state AS memberItemState, p.profile_pic AS profilePic, up.profile_pic AS profilePick FROM mini_market_chatroom c INNER JOIN mini_market_member_item i ON c.member_item_no = i.member_item_no INNER join mini_market_member m ON m.member_id = c.member_id INNER join mini_market_member_pic p on m.member_id = p.member_id AND p.member_id = c.member_id INNER join mini_market_member_pic up on c.member_unique_no = up.member_unique_no WHERE c.member_unique_no = #{memberUniqueNo} OR c.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mini_market_chatroom( nickname, member_unique_no, member_id, chatroom_active, member_item_no ) VALUES ( #{nickname}, #{memberUniqueNo}, #{memberId}, #{chatroomActive}, #{memberItemNo} )
